Category:Songs149113fq9dcozg3wmaumyvre0xvp31v8aan1c1632172014-10-28T23:21:18ZThe Dragon Demands5014364A category for songs that appear within the fictional universe of the ''[[Game of Thrones]]'' television series. That is, these are songs which the characters themselves know about, and which people might sing on-screen, as opposed to background music which only appears in [[:Category:Soundtracks|the soundtracks]] (though sometimes, songs characters sing on-screen are subsequently used in the soundtracks).
[[Category:Culture & Society]]
